features: 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗬𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗖𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗡𝗦𝗘𝗥 – Natural Outcome Oily Skin Cleanser is used to exfoliate oily and acne prone skin. Cleansing unwanted pore clogging oils and dirt while preventing acne. Our oil control face wash is perfect for people with oily skin types that are tired of greasy skin. Purify your skin while removing unwanted oils.

𝗢𝗜𝗟 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗧𝗥𝗢𝗟 𝗛𝗬𝗗𝗥𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 – Treating oily skin has never been easy, until now! Natural Outcomes Oily Skin Collection makes it easy to achieve a balanced and hydrated complexion with just three easy steps. Take control of oily skin and jump into a new shine free mattifying complexion.

𝗡𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗟 𝗜𝗡𝗚𝗥𝗘𝗗𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗧𝗦 - All Natural Outcome products are naturally sourced in the USA to provide the safest ingredients. Our oil-free purifying cleanser consists of Grapeseed Extract, a natural cleaning oil that balances skin surface. Citrus Fruit Extract is used as a natural skin clarifying agent that boost & regenerates skin. Tea Tree Extract helps clear acne & aids in controlling oily skin.

𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗬 𝗧𝗢 𝗨𝗦𝗘 – Our daily facial cleanser is easy and painless to apply. Simply pump a dab of our face wash into your hands, gently massage the solution onto your face in a circular motion until fully absorbed. This day and night cleanser is perfect for men and women struggling with oily skin.

𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗡𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗟 𝗢𝗨𝗧𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗘 – Our belief is that all skincare should be made with pure and honest intentions. All Natural Outcome products are made in the USA using no sulfates, parabens, or dyes, and is never tested on animals. Giving you an organic glow with peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent face wash
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for something to wash my face that would not cause more issues than the ones I’m currently experiencing. My face is extremely sensitive and most things I’ve used (even those that say are natural and for sensitive skins) have cause severe allergic reactions/breakouts. I came upon this product and after reading several reviews decided to give it a try. I can say that this product so far has been amazing. I’ve used it for a few days now without any issues. Love the scent it has and does not leave my face dry or anything and I feel that my face is finally clean. I would definitely recommend and will continue to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for teenagers
reviews.reviewText: I got this cleanser for my boys. Like most teens, they've got extremely oily skin, especially in the T zone, and are acne prone. We've used other products, but most of the ones to prevent acne end up drying out their faces. I found this cleanser on a top 10 face washes for oily skin. After reading the article, I realized that we'd been treating the acne, which is the product of oily skin, instead of the actual oily skin. This cleanser targets the oily skin by cleaning out the pore clogging oils, clarifying the blackheads and clarifying deep into the pores. Doing this then normalizes the skin and helps prevent acne. My boys are really liking this foaming cleanser. It foams up really well and it doesn't take much to wash your entire face. The citrus scent is light and refreshing. They've been using the cleanser and the toner for almost 2 weeks and I can see their acne starting to clear. The first few days they both broke out, but that just tells you that it's working out all of that gunk in the pores. After the initial flare up, there has been no new acne appearing. One of my boys has very sensitive skin and this is working wonderfully for him. I'm extremely happy with this product and will definitely continue to purchase it for my boys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth a try for your skin!
reviews.reviewText: So far so good! I love the smell of the product and it has been doing a great job removing oils from my face. It’s been about 2 weeks so keeping an eye on how it will work in about a month from now. Nice product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with my oliy skin
reviews.reviewText: I’ll be honest, I really didn’t think this would work, but I do notice a difference in my skin.This product smells good and doesn’t irritate my skin. I will definitely be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have pretty oily skin - mostly T-zone and this controls the shine most of the day. The scent is very light, but pleasant. It doesn’t foam up like soap, but doesn’t leave any residue. This cleanser works better than any other I’ve tried and is a great value for the price. I use it everyday and have only had to buy it twice in a year. Highly recommend 😊 !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ok it works but I'll just use the bottle till it finished.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have very oily skin.
reviews.reviewText: I use this to wash my face everyday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ruined my face
reviews.reviewText: I used this product for 3 weeks, it did great at getting rid of my access oil but it broke my skin out so bad. I decided the access oil is worth keeping versus the huge outbreaks on my face. I went back to the product I was using previously which is still trying to fix the damage. Very disappointed in this product!

reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my skin, smells great too

reviews.reviewText: It works really well on my oily skin. I'd give it 5 stars only it smells pretty rank, but I'd still buy it again, it's great value. Might add a few drops of essential oil to it..
